monsters.name: Aboleth
monsters.description: An enormous aberration with slimy tentacles and a horrifying appearance.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mucous Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for 1d4 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17).

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the aboleth. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

legendaryActions.name: Detect
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendaryActions.name: Tail Swipe
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendaryActions.name: Tentacle Attack
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes one tentacle attack.
